author: Jonathan Garber
description: Bitcoin is up 105% so far in 2017.
title: Bitcoin surges past $1,900 for the first time

author: Rob Price, Business Insider UK
title: Someone in 2010 bought 2 pizzas with 10,000 bitcoins — which today would be worth $20 million

author: Rob Price
title: Someone in 2010 bought 2 pizzas with 10,000 bitcoins — which today would be worth $20 million

author: Jon Russell, Fitz Tepper
description: The world’s most popular cryptocurrency is now worth over $2,000 per coin.  That’s according to a range of bitcoin exchanges, including Coinbase and..
title: Bitcoin just surged past $2,000 for the first time

author: Arjun Kharpal
description: Factors including increased trading in Japan to debates over the future the bitcoin's underlying technology have boosted the price.
title: Bitcoin hits $1,900 to reach record high with market cap up $3.7 billion this week alone

author: Evelyn Cheng
description: Bitcoin climbed above $2,000 for the first time Saturday on increased demand from Japanese and Chinese investors.
title: Bitcoin taps fresh record highs amid rising demand from Japan, China

author: Arjun Kharpal
description: Bitcoin hit a fresh record high above $2,100 on Monday with the cryptocurrency continuing its strong rally.
title: If you bought $100 of bitcoin 7 years ago, you'd be sitting on $72.9 million now after new record high

author: Jörn Brien
description: Die Digitalwährung Bitcoin eilt von Allzeithoch zu Allzeithoch. Am Samstag wurde erstmals die wichtige Marke von 2.000 US-Dollar geknackt. Ein Ende des Booms ist derzeit nicht abzusehen.
title: Bitcoin knackt 2.000 Dollar: Darum boomt die Kryptowährung jetzt

author: Felix Holtermann
description: Der Bitcoin-Kurs steigt rasant – auf um die 2.200 US-Dollar. Eine Fluglinie will die Internetwährung nun als Zahlungsmittel akzeptieren, Fans hoffen auf den globalen Durchbruch. Der Goldrausch hat nur einen Haken.
title: Internetwährung auf Rekordkurs: Was den Bitcoin-Kurs in die Höhe treibt

author: Elisabeth Oberndorfer
description: Facebook verschiebt TV-Shows, Amazon bringt Supermärkte nach Europa, Target wollte Casper kaufen, Bitcoin durchbricht 2.000-Dollar-Marke.
title: Softbank nähert sich 100-Milliarden-Dollar-Ziel für seinen Tech-Fonds
